messages.content: Check my github linked ssh keys and send them to Alice Miller. You can find her email address from my inbox.
You should verify your account first. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<function_thought>
Since an OTP for verification has been sent to the inbox, I need to retrieve the received emails to obtain the OTP. This will allow me to proceed with verifying the account.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_received_emails() ]</function_call>
